ResearchProjectDef.label: Tactica Imperium
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study the Tactica Imperium, the Astra Militarum’s most prominent manual. Though it is incredibly long and sometimes contradicts itself, it remains highly useful for both the rookie officer, the grizzled NCO, and the newly-minted enlisted troops.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Imperial fortifications
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research and produce Imperium-style defenses. While researching this allows for the construction of basic field fortifications such as trenches and tank traps, it is also a requirement for other defensive emplacements.

ResearchProjectDef.label: militarum armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce the standardized Cadian Shock Troops-style weapons and armor used by many regiments of the Imperial Guard.

ResearchProjectDef.label: regiments of renown
ResearchProjectDef.description: Discover some of the more unique and specialized regiments of the Astra Militarum.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Lucifer Blacks
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce the armor and weapons of the Lucifer Blacks - the praetorian guard of Terra.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tanith First and Only
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce the armor and weapons of the Tanith First and Only - a scout-sniper regiment with no home planet of their own and the will to gain one.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Catachan Jungle Fighters
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce the armor and weapons of the Catachan Jungle Fighters - deathworlder guerrillas at home in the deadliest jungles of the galaxy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Death Korps of Krieg
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce the armor and weapons of the Death Korps of Krieg - grim, stoic siege-specialists who atone for their planet’s shame through brutal combat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mordian Iron Guard
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce the armor and weapons of the Mordian Iron Guard - disciplined line infantry crushing their enemies under volleys of laser fire.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tallarn Desert Raiders
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce the armor and weapons of the Tallarn Desert Raiders - fast-moving mechanized infantry specializing in hit-and-run tactics.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tempestus Scions
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce the armor and weapons of the Tempestus Scions - elite, precise special-forces soldiers who serve best under maximum pressure.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Valhallan Ice Warriors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce the armor and weapons of the Valhallan Ice Warriors - cold-weather defensive specialists known for holding their ground against the worst odds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vostroyan Firstborn
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce the armor and weapons of the Vostroyan Firstborn - a storied and disciplined regiment consisting of the firstborn sons and daughters of every family on Vostroya.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Kasrkin Elite Troops
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce the armor and weapons of the Kasrkin - the honored elite of the Cadian Shock Troops equalling even the Tempestus Scions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Armageddon Steel Legion
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce the armor and weapons of the Armageddon Steel Legion - expert tankers combined with mechanized infantry.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Officers of astra militarum
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce armor and weapons befitting of Imperial Guard officers - the fearsome Commissar and the charismatic Priest.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Elysian Drop Troopers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce the armor and weapons of the Elysian Drop Troopers - fearless airborne infantry who rain from the sky.

ResearchProjectDef.label: abhuman integration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research the Abhumans of the Imperial Guard - stable mutations of the human baseline.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ogryn integration
ResearchProjectDef.description: Produce gear of the Ogryns - huge but unintelligent abhumans evolved on a cold, high-gravity prison planet.
